main event: UFO sighting reported over Washington D.C. on 22 August 1967, concluded to be a balloon.
interesting points: Object was round and red in color, with a flashing light that disappeared suddenly., Witnesses reported seeing the object overhead without optical aids., The sighting lasted between 10 to 20 minutes., Approximately 30 calls were received about the sighting, indicating public interest., A policeman in Georgetown claimed to have seen the object and thought it was similar to a flare.
sighted object: round red object with flashing light
witness description: a policeman who observed the object while on duty in Georgetown
